data.title: Charlie Chan Carries on — Columbus Metropolitan Library
data.meta_description: Charlie Chan Carries on — Biggers, Earl Derr, 1884-1933 — Charlie Chan carries on--the 1931 Fox motion picture starring Warner Oland as Chan--is now considered a "lost" film (the original film materials were destroyed in a vault fire.) Unless a copy surfaces in some remote corner of the world, as happened with "Charlie Chan in Paris," this original screenplay is the closest Chan fans will come to seeing the original film.
data.text:
Charlie Chan Carries onCharlie Chan Carries on

the Screenplay for the Lost Charlie Chan Film
